query:
SELECT
                    t.id             AS "id!: Uuid",
                    t.project_id     AS "project_id!: Uuid",
                    t.parent_id,
                    t.title          AS "title!",
                    t.description,
                    t.status         AS "status!",
                    t.priority,
                    t.due_date,
                    t.assignee_id,
                    t.issue_number,
                    t.created_at     AS "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                    t.updated_at     AS "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
                FROM tasks t
                WHERE t.team_id = $1
                  AND t.id IN (
                      SELECT tt.task_id
                      FROM task_tags tt
                      WHERE tt.tag_id = ANY($2)
                      GROUP BY tt.task_id
                      HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT tt.tag_id) = $3
                  )
                ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
